entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bug in Data Flow Analysis on FixedStatementSyntax #60402
  • `await` is not highlighted in top-level statements when clicked #60400
  • `SyntaxGenerator.AddAttributes` does not add `assembly:` target if there are already assembly attributes in the file #60399
  • Consider adding an API with ability to classify conversion in a checked evaluation context. #60397
  • Opening .editorconfig in VS 17.2 Preview 2 causes conflicting unsaved changes #60396

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid checking HasValue in nullable comparison for non-default constants #60405
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move StackTraceAnalyzer over to VirtualCharSequence #60404
    Area-IDE
  • Treat `async` as a modifier in some edge cases for C# #60403
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Highlight `await` and `return` in top-level statements #60401
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move tests to different assembly to address combined string length issue #60395
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • [LSP] Explicitly define the completion items to resolve #60393
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #60410
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/snappy/nodelay #60409
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60407
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60406
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add feature to convert from top-level-statements to Program.Main form #60383
    Area-IDE
  • Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string #60227
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Add BoundArrayInitialization.IsInferred #60391
    Area-Compilers
  • Move IDE0078 codefix to Analyzers #60378
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [LSP] Remove the majority of usages of client name. #60357
    Area-IDE, LSP
